Scripts.OnLoad:
local icon = _G[self:GetName() .. "Icon"] icon:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\BuffConsolidation") icon:SetTexCoord(0, 0.5, 0, 1) icon:ClearAllPoints() icon:SetPoint("CENTER", -2, -2) icon:SetSize(62, 62)
SecureHandler_OnLoad(self) self:SetAttribute("_onenter", [[ self:GetFrameRef("target"):Show() ]])
self:SetAttribute("_onleave", [[ self:GetFrameRef("target"):Hide() ]])

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT") GameTooltip:SetFrameLevel(self:GetFrameLevel() + 2)
local slot = self:GetAttribute("target-slot") if slot then GameTooltip:SetInventoryItem("player", slot) else GameTooltip:SetUnitAura("player", self:GetID(), self:GetAttribute('filter')) end
Scripts.OnAttributeChanged:
if name ~= "index" then local name, icon, count, type, expire, ratio, _ = self:GetName() local slot = self:GetAttribute("target-slot") local filter = self:GetAttribute('filter') local border = _G[name .. 'Border'] local harm = filter == 'HARMFUL' local symbol = self.symbol
if not slot then icon, count, type, _, expire = select(3, UnitAura('player', self:GetID(), filter)) ratio = 1
if harm then if ENABLE_COLORBLIND_MODE ~= "1" then local color = DebuffTypeColor[type or 'none'] border:SetVertexColor(color.r, color.g, color.b) elseif type then symbol:SetText(DebuffTypeSymbol[type]) symbol:Show() else symbol:Hide() end end else local _, mainHand, _, _, offHand, _ = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() icon = GetInventoryItemTexture("player", slot) expire = (slot == 16) and mainHand or offHand ratio, count = 1000, 0 end
if slot or harm then border:Show() else border:Hide() end
if expire > 0 then self.expire = expire self.ratio = ratio self:SetScript('OnUpdate', Cornucopia_AuraUpdate) else self:SetScript('OnUpdate', nil) self.duration:Hide() end
self.count:SetText(count > 0 and count or '') _G[name .. 'Icon']:SetTexture(icon) end
